description.en: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.ar: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.br: Nenhum pequeno Pang fornece buffs por mais tempo do que o Vermelhão. Então cace um pouco mais, aguente um pouco mais, explore um pouco mais. Você sempre pode mais com o Vermelhão.
description.cns: 没有哪个胖胖能比火力胖胖上新鲜BUFF时间更长。所以多战斗一段时间，多磨炼一段时间，多坚持一段时间。火力胖胖陪你更长时间。
description.de: Der süße Red Pang hebt Gegenstände für dich auf.
description.fi: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.fil: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.fr: Un petit Pang rouge qui suit son maître pour ramasser les objets laissés par les monstres.
description.id: Tidak ada Pang kecil yang dapat memberikan buff lebih lama dari aku. Denganku kamu dapat menghabisi lebih banyak dan grinding lebih lama. Semua jadi lebih lama denganku, Big Red.
description.it: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.jp: さすらいのベニスは、主人の後を付いて回り、落ちているアイテムを収集してくれます。
description.kr: 비스를 장착 시 해당 능력치를 캐릭터에게 부여하며, 주변의 아이템을 자동 습득 합니다.
description.nl: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.pl: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.sp: Ningún pequeño Pang te buffa por más tiempo que el Gran Rojo. Así que mata un poco más, grindea un poco más, continúa un poco más. Más tiempo con el Gran Pang Rojo.
description.sw: No little Pang freshens buffs longer than Big Red. So kill a little longer, grind a little longer, hold tight a little longer. Longer with Big Red.
description.th: ไม่มีแป้งน้อยคนใดที่จะทำให้บัฟสดชื่นได้นานกว่าบิ๊กเรด ดังนั้นฆ่าให้นานขึ้นอีกนิด บดให้นานขึ้นอีกนิด จับให้แน่นนานขึ้นอีกนิด ยาวขึ้นด้วยBig Red
description.tw: 召喚或解除可愛紅紅胖企鵝。
description.vi: Không có chút Pang nào được buff lâu hơn Big Red. Vì vậy, giết lâu hơn một chút, xay lâu hơn một chút, giữ chặt lâu hơn một chút. Dài hơn với Big Red.
